metadata.name: by_narrow_subject_frequency
metadata.title: Frequency by Narrow Survey Subject Area Assigned to Collection
metadata.about: This dataset is a subset of the original and contains all digitized objects arranged by frequency of the more narrow survey subject area assigned to the collection to which they belong.
